```{r warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(magrittr)
library(kableExtra)

source('code/fenestrated/fenestrated-utils.R')
source('code/propensity-utils.R')

sel_data <- get_data()
```

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis"}
fenestrated <- sel_data$fenestrated %>% as.numeric()
explore_vars(sel_data, outcome_name='fenestrated')
```

## Propensity Scores Overlapping
```{r echo=FALSE}
sel_data[, fenestrated := ifelse(fenestrated == 'Yes', 1, 0)]
run_logistic_propensity(sel_data, outcome_name='fenestrated') ->
  res_plot
print(res_plot)
```
